abstractText: Objectives 1) Quantify size distribution of substrate in fast water habitats by measuring 21 particles from 10 cross-sections for a total of 210 particles per site 2) estimate embeddedness of cobbles. Changes made for 2012: - particles assigned to size classes using a gravelometer instead of taking discrete measurements - added percent fines surrounding cobbles
title: Particle Size Distribution and Particle Embeddedness v2.0
